ComicInfo.Summary: Graduating Clash! When you’re the son of the Savage Dragon, anything you do is a major media event! So when Malcolm Dragon graduates from high school, it’s all-out mayhem! It’s the event of the century and you’re invited!
ComicInfo.Title: Ominous Reprieve Part 2
ComicInfo.Writer: Erik Larsen,Terrance Griep Jr,Terrance Griep Jr.,Terrance Griep Jr.,Erik Larsen
